definitions.definition: A ball that passes so far from the batsman that the umpire deems it unplayable ; the arm signal used by an umpire to signal a wide; the extra run added to the batting side 's score

main_definition: ( cricket ) A ball that passes so far from the batsman that the umpire deems it unplayable ; the arm signal used by an umpire to signal a wide; the extra run added to the batting side 's score
